title: I feel dumb and hated in this community
body: I really want to keep playing but every game let alone every post I make just shows me how much of a full on r%%%%% I am about everything. Should I even bother anymore?

replies.body: It's just this toxic community. If you ever want to have intelligent conversation about the game, never come to these forumns. They only like memes and "OMG OP" "BROKEN" cry posts. And just mute in game the moment someone becomes toxic. Prevent the tilt before it even starts.

Uh, no. There are still a lot of decent posts, a lot of which have constructive discourse without one side being blindly downvoted.

It's true that there's a lot of circlejerk, but that doesn't mean the whole place is bad.

You gotta play they game for the love of the game itself. What also helps is playing with friends and people you know so the flaming isnt an issue.

The only thing a lot of the community will try to teach you is that you are a horrible person and deserve to die... don't listen to it.

No, you shouldn't bother.  You should invest your time and energy into more constructive and real things.  Playing this game will bring you nothing but anguish.  You will never find fulfillment here and this community is the worst overall gaming community that exists.  There are any number of other "hobbies" just begging for your attention that will end up being both more enjoyable and more rewarding.

tbh its a toxic community.. and riot doesnt do anything about it... so... idk what to tell you and secondly. HA. HA HA AHAHAHHAHAHAHA XD. were all bad and stupid at this game and its knowledge. so dont be so down. and dont cri so much. stick up your middle finger my friend and move tf on
No offense, but I have no idea who you are. And I don't mean that to be a slight to you in any way; rather, I think your perceptions of being hated within the community are greatly exaggerated.
